alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 11:35PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing very heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 3 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1133 PM EST, a band of very heavy snow was along a line extending from South Fallsburg to Pleasant Valley to West Hartford and moving north at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Torrington, Poughkeepsie, New Milford, Kingston, Beacon, New Paltz, Ellenville, Sherman, Rhinebeck, Pawling, Hyde Park, Brookfield, Plattekill, Canton, Pleasant Valley, Thomaston, New Hartford, Hurley, Woodstock, and Wappingers Falls. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 19. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
